system.requirements:
Tier 2: Cold Hearted, Intimidate
Aptitudes: Unaligned
system.effect: Once per game session, character can killed an allied NPC (an NPC that trusts and is friendly towards them), or one of their own Minions. They gain +10 to their next Infamy Test if killing an NPC, or +20 if a Minion. This may have consequences as determined by GM.
